text:
Hi all,

HubSpot has a "Manage Duplicate Contacts" feature in the CRM found here:
<https://app.HubSpot.com/duplicates/[ID]/contacts>

Unfortunately,  you can only merge duplicate contacts 1 by 1 and there is no way to export the list.  Does anyone know if it's possible to access duplicate information from the contacts API or some other way to handle these en masse?
